name: MyAnimeList.net :: Miku@Luka vocaloids theme
description:
MyAnimeList.net Miku@Luka vocaloids theme

		Miku Hatsune and Luka Megurine vocaloids theme for MyAnimeList
		and native theme for anime/manga lists (CSS3-features).
		AdBlock included.
